name: 曾添文
objective:
四化一乙化(下)
介紹液體與固體物質狀態、溶液性質、動力學、酸鹼理論、溶液平衡的應用、熱力學，環境化學、電化學、非金屬及金屬元素、有機化學，奠定學生良好化學基礎。
schedule:
1.液體與固體:液體、固體之餘狀態,作用力,vapor pressure, 固體結構
2.溶液性質: vapor pressures of solutions, colligative properties
3.動力學: rate law, integrated rate law, mechanism, catalysis
4.化學平衡:平衡常數, 應用, Chatelier’s principle
5.酸鹼理論:acids and bases and its properties, Lewis acids and bases
6.溶液平衡的應用:溶解度,沉澱,equilibria involving complex ions
7.熱力學: spontaneity, entropy, free energy, free energy and work
8.電化學: voltaic cells,batteries,electrolysis,商業運作之電化工程
9.非金屬元素: 5A~8A elements
10.金屬元素: metallic bonding, transition metals, 
11.配位化學:chemistry of coordination compounds
scorePolicy: 平常定期小考共七次成績予以平均
materials:
書籍: Chemistry
版數及出版年: Seventh edition (2007)
作者: Steven S. Zumdahl,Susan A. Zumdahl
